00048 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) 
00049 {
00050   ofstream logOut;
00051   LogStream log;
00052   string logName;
00053     
00054   try {
00055     
00056     CNGenderEngine engine;
00057     
00058     /* Parse options. */
00059     engine.setUsage(
00060             "apt-copynumber-gender - A program to compute gender. \n"
00061             "sample usage for CytoScanHD:\n"
00062             "   ./apt-copynumber-gender \\\n"
00063             "            --verbose 3 \\\n"
00064             "            --chrX-probes ./lib/CytoScanHD_Array.chrXprobes \\\n"
00065             "            --chrY-probes ./lib/CytoScanHD_Array.chrYprobes \\\n"
00066             "            --male-gender-ratio 1.5 \\\n"
00067             "            --female-gender-ratio 0.9 \\\n"
00068             "            --cel-files ./celFile"
00069             "            --out-dir outputDir"
00070         " \n\n");
00071     engine.parseArgv(argv); 
00072     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00073     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00074 /*
00075     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00076     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00077     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00078     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00079     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00080     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00081     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00082 */
00083     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00084 
00085     engine.openStandardLog("apt-copynumber-gender.log",logOut,log);
00086     
00087     engine.run();
00088   } 
00089   catch(...) {
00090       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00091       // Close log files
00092       logOut.close();
00093       return 1;
00094   }
00095   // Close log files
00096   logOut.close();
00097 
00098   return 0;
00099 }
